0.description: Extract architecture files and concatenate them into a single representation.

1.description: Tokenize concatenated architectures to fit within the OpenAI API token limit.

2.description: Vectorize tokenized architectures for local LLM compatibility.

3.description: Log introspective insights about architecture processing.

4.description: Iteratively refine architectures based on introspection and analysis.
